text: Tyo cija sahrai naramro cha, jasako satta tiniharule aphula'i becihale, tyo tiniharuko anastha ho, allahako tarphabata a'eko cijasanga matra yasa d'ahako karana ki allahale aphna bhaktaharumadhye jasamathi cahyo aphno krpa garyo, yasakarana tiniharu eka krodha pachi arko krodhaka patra bha'e. Ra anasthavanaharuka lagi apamanajanaka sajaya cha
